name: Segment
description: Collect user data and send it to your other tools.

name: Heap
description: Product analytics API for web and mobile, captures all events.

name: Pirsch
description: Privacy-friendly web analytics with a backend integration and API.

name: LoginRadius
description: Managed user authentication service with SSO.

name: Magic.link
description: Passwordless (email-based) log in as a service.

name: Hanko
description: Passwordless (WebAuthn API) PSD2, eIDAS, and GDPR compliant.

name: SuperTokens
description: Opensource and hosted email & Oauth authentication with prebuilt UI.

name: Permit.io
description: Permissions and access-control as a service.

name: CircleCI
description: YML to configure your builds, parallel jobs, jobs marketplace.

name: Gitlab
description: Open source CI and hosted solution with Github-like abilities.

name: Ghost
description: Blog platform, can be used as headless CMS (ex. with Hexo).

name: roboflow
description: Simplified computer vision model creation for developers.

name: Airtable
description: Database and spreadsheet hybrid with an API.

name: Supabase
description: Hosted and open source managed postgres DB like firebase.

name: PlanetScale
description: Hosted managed MySQL database, CI integration & auto scaling.

name: Google Cloud's operations suite
description: Set of debug primitives (capture, log injection, etc) for Google cloud.

name: Lightrun
description: Debug production servers using a plugin in the IDE (on-prem or SaaS) that supports Java, Node.js, and Python.

name: Rookout
description: Debug production servers via a cloud-based debugger. Supporting Java, .Net, Node.js, Python, and Ruby.

name: Render
description: Deploy from git to a CDN with SSL.

name: Heroku
description: Deploy via CLI to scalable servers.

name: Digital Ocean App Platform
description: Deploy and don't care about infrastructure, works with all major frameworks.

name: Fly.io
description: Deploy dockerized full stack apps via a location-aware service (latency reduction).

name: Railway
description: Out of the box git to deployment with auto scaling, DBs, secrets and rollbacks.

name: MuutIo
description: Tools to create a community-driven app.

name: TurnTo
description: Ratings, community Q&A, reviews, and comments as a service.

name: Yotpo
description: Reviews ratings and Q&A as a service.

name: Gitter
description: Chat and networking platform for developers.

name: swimm
description: Docs that are coupled with your code, auto-synced, works with your IDE.

name: Doppler
description: Environment variable management across projects, in one place.

name: Envkey
description: Environment management with syncing mechanism for all apps.

name: split
description: Feature flags platform with data analytics.

name: mapbox
description: Maps and locations products for devs.

name: SmartyStreets
description: US Reverse Geocoding and Address Verification APIs.

name: Codota
description: AI code completions for your IDE.

name: Kite
description: AI assistant in your IDE (Python or JS).

name: Apideck
description: Integration marketplace builder, one-API with 3rd parties for quick development.

name: Cloudinary
description: Optimize, create, manage, and deliver images and videos.

name: ImageKit
description: Automate image optimization, transformation, and delivery.

name: Mux
description: APIs to upload, manage, and stream video.

name: Pintura
description: A fully configurable JavaScript image editor SDK.

name: APITemplate.io
description: APIs to generate images and PDFs from reusable templates.

name: Twilio
description: SMS, push notifications, and VoIP APIs.

name: Vonage
description: Video, SMS, chat, and voice APIs.

name: stream
description: Feed and chat as a service.

name: ngrok
description: Generate public URLs for internal servers (behind NAT/firewall).

name: zigi
description: Developer’s assistant for mundane non-coding tasks via Slack.

name: Nylas
description: APIs for productivity workflows (email, calendar, contacts...) - like plaid for productivity.

name: Sentry
description: Application monitoring for bugs and performance.

name: Statuspal
description: Public/Private status pages for services with integrations.

name: Stripe Payments
description: Accept payments and move money globally with APIs.

name: Plaid
description: Accept, send ACH (bank transfers) and get bank information.

name: Paddle
description: Revenue delivery platform for SaaS with broad geographical support (unlike stripe at the moment).

name: PDFBlade
description: HTML to PDF API usage based pricing.

name: Carbone
description: JSON into PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, ODS... API.

name: Export SDK
description: PDF generator API with visual template editor.

name: ScrapingBee
description: Using headless browsers and proxies to scrape without being blocked.

name: Algolia
description: Search as a service and full suite of search APIs.

name: Swiftype
description: Search as a service (crawlers and React ready).

name: Websolr
description: Open-source and hosted search with Solr.

name: typesense cloud
description: Open-source and hosted search as a Service.
